questions.question: What is a good reason to purchase a used car over a new car?

choices.answer: New cars depreciate faster than used cars
Insurance is generally cheaper on a used car
There are typically better financing options on a new car
You can get more car for your money when buying used

questions.question: A disadvantage of buying a new car is it loses value faster than a used car. This is called

choices.answer: Capital gain
Inflation
Depreciation
Amortization

questions.question: Which is NOT an expense of owning a car?

choices.answer: Repairs & maintenance
Gasoline
License & registration fees
Utilities

questions.question: Paying full-price for a car in cash has many benefits. This is a better option for someone who

choices.answer: Has the money saved up and can afford to pay in full
Does not have a steady source of income
Wants to get a great price from a private party
Wants to build their credit score

questions.question: Financing a vehicle has advantages & disadvantages. Which is a disadvantage?

choices.answer: When leasing, you need a smaller amount of money upfront
You pay interest and fees on borrowed money
Your credit score is not taken into consideration
You have more flexibility to pay the car off over time

questions.question: A certified used car is one that

choices.answer: Has been inspected by the manufacturer
Can be bought at a lower price than a comparable model
Has a price that cannot be negotiated
Often includes an extended warranty

questions.question: What is the purpose of a Carfax?

choices.answer: Shows the true market value of the vehicle being purchased
Calculates costs of the vehicle's maintenance & repairs
Offers financing options to the consumer
Supplies a vehicle history report to individuals

questions.question: What information is listed in a vehicle's Carfax report?

choices.answer: Ownership history
Title history
Repair and maintenance history
Current loan balance

questions.question: All of the following are advantages of leasing a vehicle EXCEPT

choices.answer: Your monthly payment is typically cheaper
Your auto insurance is typically cheaper
You get a new vehicle more frequently
Standard maintenance is typically included

questions.question: Financing an auto loan over a longer period of time

choices.answer: Increases your monthly payment
Decreases your monthly payment
Increases the amount you pay in interest
Decreases the amount you pay in interest

questions.question: In some cases, the used car you are buying may have a lien on it. A lien means

choices.answer: The bank or lender is in possession of the title
The car has been paid for in cash
The car was bought in a different state than it's registered
The car has alignment & maintenance issues

questions.question: It is important to have a used car inspected. How much does a professional inspection cost?

choices.answer: Approximately $300
Approximately $200
Approximately $100
Approximately $25

questions.question: What is a mobile inspection?

choices.answer: Download an app to input photos of the vehicle inspection
An agency who connects you with a local mechanic
An inspector comes to your home & does an on-site inspection
Another term for a test drive

questions.question: When trying to haggle the price of a used car, who should name the first price?

choices.answer: The salesman
You

questions.question: It is important to comparison shop when purchasing a car. What does comparison shop mean?

choices.answer: Always buy from a local dealership
Take several photos to use for comparison
Compare the true market value of every vehicle
Compare the price & quality from different vendors

questions.question: What document is often called a "pink slip"?

choices.answer: Proof of insurance
The title
A cashier's check
Car sales receipt

questions.question: This type of law provides remedy for purchasers of cars that fail to meet standards of quality.

choices.answer: Kelley Blue Law
Lemon Law
Edmunds Law
DOT Law

questions.question: True or False: Buying a new car is always better than buying a used car.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Statistically, the average vehicle will have ________ owners in a lifetime.
One of the first steps in shopping for a vehicle is to create a(n)

choices.answer: Budget
List of wants
Insurance claim
Email account
